name: Sweet Dreams (HitchH1k3r)
description:
A game made for Mini Ludum Dare 33 "You are the Monster"

^_^ IT'S NOT SCARY ^_^ Sorry if the title image mislead you...
Sweet Dreams is about the Bogey Man influencing children's happy dreams, and turning them evil. You will need to find a way into their dream, and then create a shadow on the wall that will frighten them into a nightmare.

Controls
  • Move Player - WASD or Arrows
  • Aim - Mouse
  • Interact - Left Click
  • After entering the dream you will have to create a shadow from the things you've collected, try to make a shadow you think looks cool.
  • The controls to move the objects around are a bit tricky (but that is the nature of manipulating objects in 3D space).
  • After you finish your shadow you will get a chance to name it and share it with everyone else who has beaten the game in the Hall of Shadows. 
Challenges/Inspiration
  •  Make the scariest shadow you can think of. 
  • Make your favorite video game character. 
  • Make a self portrait?
